root: ^The dance kid said you had some kind of ultimate dance move?

c-0: ^Ivy? Oh, yeah, I told her that a couple years ago. It's actually really simple, but she kept refering to it as an ultimate move and it's an excuse to make her do her chores. Y'know, "Maybe if you clean your room, I'll teach you the ultimate dance move."
^Yeah, I can teach it to you. It's probably getting mean to keep her from it at this point.
